detail_desc: Sleeveless, calf-length dress in softly draping satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a deep neckline front and back and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Parka in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring and metal cord locks, diagonal flap front pockets with a button, and an inner pocket. Inner ribbing and an adjustable tab and buttons at the cuffs. Lining made from recycled polyester.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, slightly crinkled jersey. Straight cut at the top with a small frill trim, gentle draping over the bust and narrow shoulder straps with a bow. Lined bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
High-waisted briefs in microfibre with a laser-cut edges, a lined gusset and string back. The briefs have a light sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and hips.
Wide-fitting striped cotton jersey top with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Draped stand-up collar with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck and an opening at the back. Concealed zip in one side, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist with a draped section at the front and narrow elastication and a sewn-on tie belt at the back. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Sports top in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the front with a chin guard, and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front, a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Opening and covered button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back, and a seam at the waist with pleats. Partly lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, drawstring down the front and a smocked back. Elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Shorts in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Sleeveless, cropped, rib-knit top. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Studio Collection. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, medium coverage at the back and zigzag seams around the edges. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. Soft fleece lining.The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Fine-knit cotton dress with short sleeves.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved tops in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft bra top in lace and mesh and a pair of short lace shorts. Top with a V-neck, short butterfly sleeves and an elastic hem with a fastening and ties at the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist, scalloped hems and a lined gusset.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length approx. 7 cm.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a V-neck and wide flounced trim at the front.
Wide, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless cropped jersey top with lacing at the front.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cowl-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in stretch imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a seam at the knees.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch wool weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, front and back pockets and a fake fly with a press-stud.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless maxi dress in jersey and lace with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length, 42-47 cm.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a wider neckline, print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a cotton blend with sequined and beaded embroidery at the top and short sleeves.
Fabric loafers. Heel 2 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim at the top of the back.
Cropped top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Shirt in softly draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
High-waisted, 5-pocket shorts in superstretch twill with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shorter blouse in an airy weave with a deep neckline with inset lace trims and an opening at the front with ties at the top. Short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim, and smocking and a frill trim at the hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Scallop-edged round neck with an opening and button at the back and long, trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Calf-length circular skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and high slit at the front. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce that can be worn in different ways. Matching bottoms.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Leather ankle boots with scuba fabric inserts and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Long dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides. Gathered, draped skirt.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Pin-tucks at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a sewn-on extended hem in woven fabric with fake buttons, and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leather sandals with rubber soles.
Straight-cut shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short, smocked skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high, flounced waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted jacket in gently draping wool twill with peak lapels, flap front pockets, buttons at the front and concealed buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the shoulders and an open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Wide top in a soft weave with a wide neckline with narrow elastication at the top and long, flared sleeves with smock details.
Top in washed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes in a wide style with a decorative seam at the back. Raw-edge, rounded hem that is short at the front and longer at the back.
Dress in matt satin with a detachable tie belt and deep V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Sewn-in wrapover front, seam at the waist and flared skirt with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Ankle boots with a zip at one side, an elastic gore and tab with a metal buckle at the other and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
